name: voiceflow-pro
description: Business Automation Voice Agent with LiveKit and AssemblyAI Universal-Streaming

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:agents" "npm run serve:landing"
scripts.build:frontend: echo 'Frontend build skipped for static deployment'
scripts.build:backend: echo 'Backend build skipped for static deployment'
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && npm run install:agents

author: VoiceFlow Pro Team
